sentences.sentence: Private courier companies, which have more dollars to spend, use their expertise in logistics to help revitalize damaged areas after a disaster.
sentences.translation: 私人快递公司可支配的资金更多，它们利用自身在物流方面的专业技术来助力灾区的重振。

sentences.sentence: To revitalize the sector, in 2006 the government was considering renationalizing some enterprises.
sentences.translation: 为了振兴该行业，2006年政府正考虑将一些企业重新国有化。
